text: Arne Herjuaune (7 October 1945 - 21 March 2017)Arne Herjuaune's obituary was a Norwegian speed skater. He was born in Malvik and represented Trondhjems SK. He competed at the 1968 Winter Olympics in Grenoble, where he shared 5th in the 500 metres. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1945 births Category:2017 deaths Category:People from Sør-Trøndelag Category:Norwegian male speed skaters Category:Olympic speed skaters of Norway Category:Speed skaters at the 1968 Winter Olympics
title: Arne Herjuaune
